name: The Gemini
description:
A Persona 5/Persona 5 Royal fangame centered around a possible social link with Shiho Suzui. 

~~~ 🏐 ♊ 🏐 ~~~

In the wake of tragedy and subsequent physical recovery, Shiho Suzui searches for the self that she lost, looking to you for help in finding her.

The Gemini Arcana is a companion of both The Lovers and The Magician. It is represented by twins or dual personalities. Upright: The Gemini represents options, two sides to every story, two halves of a great whole. Downturned: The Gemini also represents inability to choose, the refusal to take sides or biased opinion, a missing piece.

~~~ 🏐 ♊ 🏐 ~~~

Currently up to: Rank 1

Game may contain content considered sensitive such as mentions of past sexual assault and past attempted suicide. Proceed with caution.

Game may be wonky in places, but I'm doing my best to fix issues as I find them. Please be kind when pointing out issues or giving constructive criticism.
